Rumors that Hunter Biden — the son of former Vice President Joe Biden — has died of an overdose have appeared on Facebook this week.
"I have unconfirmed reports Hunter Biden has either died from a crack overdose or is in serious condition.... ANYONE have any info on this?" Elizabeth Sequoria posted.
Sequoria declined a request for comment from USA TODAY.
"Word on the street is Hunter Biden is possibly now dead, apparently from a 'drug overdose,'" Kat Dekari Zaghi wrote.

On Instagram, some accounts — including BATEFM and Guntraband — also posted a screenshot of a headline from the site Hollywood News LA that read "Joe Biden’s Son Hunter Died From Drug Overdose in Suicide Attempt?"
Zaghi, BATEFM, Guntraband and Hollywood News LA have not responded to requests from USA TODAY for comment.
Fact check:In 1977, Biden said without orderly integration, his kids would grow up in 'racial jungle'
There is no proof to support the claim that Hunter Biden is dead. Both Lead Stories and Heavy also concluded that the claim is false.
The unfounded rumor appears to have started with a post on 4chan, which is archived here. It was posted Oct. 25 on a board titled "Politically Incorrect."
“Hunter Biden died of a crack overdose over 20 minutes ago," it reads. "Joe is already on his way to the hospital."
A week before Election Day, reporters in the press pool are appraised of almost every move a presidential candidate like Joe Biden makes.
On Sunday, Oct. 25, Biden attended church in Wilmington, Delaware, with his granddaughters and appeared at a virtual concert later that night, per the Associated Press.
On Monday, Oct. 26, he made a surprise appearance in Delaware County, Pennsylvania, per the Philadelphia Inquirer. On Tuesday, Oct. 27, Biden was set to campaign in Georgia, per The Hill.
Hunter Biden, by contrast, lives in Los Angeles, per the New York Times. He is a recovering drug addict, something he and his father have been open about.

Hunter Biden is also the only surviving child from his father's first marriage. His sister, Naomi, died as an infant in a car crash, alongside his mother, per the Associated Press. His brother, Beau, died in 2015 of brain cancer.
Fact check:Neither Biden nor Trump is calling for mandated COVID-19 vaccines
Based on our research, the claim that Hunter Biden has died is FALSE. There is no evidence to support it, and it appears to be a hoax that originated on 4chan.
